Here is a unit test that illustrates the problem.
(currently the unit test is written so that there is an assertion failed, to actually see the exception, comment out the try catch in the unit test)
Yes, saw this today for "revert" in an editor and is a major regression introduced with the fix for bug 119176.

I released the fix a little earlier today, and will now release the test case. 

Its hard to imagine us regressing on this one ... but that's what I would have said before! 

I REALLY appreciate the test cases ... the more the merry.

verified using wtp 1.0 rc3
(tried reverting in several editors)
